extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Dead Space 3 on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1250 gamer points.. All 58 Achievements included.. Descriptions for all 58 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Electronic Arts or Visceral Games.

reviews.title: It\'s great!
reviews.comment: The developer fixed a bug I reported only a day or two after, that\'s great! Pretty good app. Although I do wish there was a gamer point counter that corresponds to the achievements you have checked off. That way I can see  progress easier.
reviews.author: Isaiah Garcia

reviews.title: Miss spelled
reviews.comment: Axes high you have aces high. Very good app
reviews.author: Connor Revay
